name: How to Cook Kale in 3 Minutes (Instant Pot)
description: How to cook kale in just 3 minutes, using the Instant Pot! It comes out perfectly every time.
recipeIngredient: 10 ounce bag chopped kale (or 1 large bunch kale, washed and chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the water into the inner cooking pot of the Instant Pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the water into the inner cooking pot of the Instant Pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped kale. Don't worry if there are some stems, the Instant Pot will make them edible and not too chewy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped kale. Don't worry if there are some stems, the Instant Pot will make them edible and not too chewy.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lid on, set the valve to seal and cook on high, manual pressure for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the lid on, set the valve to seal and cook on high, manual pressure for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Once it beeps, you can either do a quick pressure release or let it naturally release (usually this takes about 10 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Once it beeps, you can either do a quick pressure release or let it naturally release (usually this takes about 10 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in hearty rice and bean bowls, or on the side of any meal. Sprinkle with salt or balsamic vinegar. It's also particularly good with cashew cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve in hearty rice and bean bowls, or on the side of any meal. Sprinkle with salt or balsamic vinegar. It's also particularly good with cashew cream.
